      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),

      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),

)

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!citeOrHighlightTag),
  a!localVariables(
    local!isTableFillIn: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!tables),
      false,
      or(
        find(
          rule!AS_GCM_removeHiddenSpanTagsFromHtml(ri!citeOrHighlightTag),
          tostring(ri!tables)
        ) > 0,
        find(
          ri!citeOrHighlightTag,
          tostring(ri!tables)
        ) > 0
      )
    ),
    local!class: regexfirstmatch(
      "class=""(.*?)""",
      ri!citeOrHighlightTag
    ),
    local!uuidAndTypeSplit: split(
      regexreplaceall("class=""cite |""", local!class, ""),
      " "
    ),
    /*Checking whether the first item has only alphabets*/
    local!isFirstItemFillinType: regexmatch(
      "^[a-zA-Z]+$",
      local!uuidAndTypeSplit[1]
    ),
    a!map(
      uuid: if(
        local!isFirstItemFillinType,
        "",
        local!uuidAndTypeSplit[1]
      ),
      fillinType: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!fillinType,
        default: a!match(
          value: local!uuidAndTypeSplit,
          whenTrue: local!isTableFillIn,
          then: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CUSTOM_FILL_IN_TYPE_TABLE,
          whenTrue: local!isFirstItemFillinType,
          then: fv!value[1],
          default: index(fv!value, 2, "")
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  ""
)

_a-0000e8e8-3f98-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule is used to handle the weird behaviour seen sometimes in the regexsearch function where the returned data is not indexable or erroring out. 
To fix this we are explicitly casting to make it proper.
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: regexsearch(
    ri!pattern,
    ri!searchString,
    ri!regexFlag,
    ri!returnGroups
  ),
  expression: a!map(
    match: touniformstring(index(fv!item, "match", "")),
    startPosition: tointeger(index(fv!item, "startPosition", null)),
    endPosition: tointeger(index(fv!item, "endPosition", null)),
    groups: rule!AS_CO_UT_castToDictionaryList(index(fv!item, "groups", null))
  )
)

      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))

  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

_a-0000ec50-376f-8000-9d94-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!colorName,
  /* White Colors */
  equals: "WHITE",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE,
  equals: "WHITE_2",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_WHITE_2,
  /* Gray Colors */
  equals: "GRAY_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_0,
  equals: "GRAY_1",
  then: "#EDEDF2",
  equals: "GRAY_2",
  then: "#DCDCE5",
  equals: "GRAY_3",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3,
  equals: "GRAY_4",
  then: "#2E2E35",
  /* Orange Colors */
  equals: "ORANGE_1",
  then: "#FFEED3",
  equals: "ORANGE_2",
  then: "#FFDCA3",
  equals: "ORANGE_3",
  then: "#FAA92F",
  equals: "ORANGE_4",
  then: "#995C00",
  /* Blue Colors */
  equals: "BLUE_0",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
  equals: "BLUE_1",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_1,
  equals: "BLUE_2",
  then: "#AFBFF8",
  equals: "BLUE_3",
  then: "#2322F0",
  equals: "BLUE_4",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_4,
  equals: "BLUE_5",
  then: "#E9EDFC",
  equals: "BLUE_6",
  then: "#08088D",
  equals: "BLUE_7",
  then: "#DCDEF5",
  /* Green Colors  */
  equals: "GREEN_1",
  then: "#E3FBDF",
  equals: "GREEN_4",
  then: "#117C00",
  /* Teal Colors */
  equals: "TEAL_1",
  then: "#E2FAF9",
  equals: "TEAL_3",
  then: "#56ADC0",
  equals: "TEAL_4",
  then: "#2C6770",
  /* Purple Colors */
  equals: "PURPLE_1",
  then: "#F2E9FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_3",
  then: "#B561FF",
  equals: "PURPLE_4",
  then: "#790DA1",
  /* Red Colors */
  equals: "RED_4",
  then: "#9F0019",
  /* Yellow Colors */
  equals: "YELLOW_0",
  then: "#FFFCEB",
  equals: "YELLOW_1",
  then: "#FFF6C9",
  equals: "YELLOW_4",
  then: "#856C00",
  /* Appian Colors */
  equals: "APPIAN_BACKGROUND",
  then: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_APPIAN_BACKGROUND,
  equals: "ACCENT",
  then: "#2322f0",
  default: ri!colorName
)

          showWhen: a!defaultValue(

          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(

              text: ri!dynamicLinkLabel,

              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(saveInto: ri!dynamicLinkSaves),

          )
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(width: "MINIMIZE"),

          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(

              icon: ri!dismissButton,
              caption: ri!dismissCaption,
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                saveInto: {
                  a!save(ri!showWhen, false()),

                },

              ),
              linkStyle: "STANDALONE",

            )
          ),

          showWhen: ri!dismissShowWhen
        )
      },

    )
  },
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  style: ri!style,
  padding: ri!padding,
  marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
  marginBelow: ri!marginBelow,
  showBorder: ri!showBorder,
  showShadow: ri!showShadow,
  shape: ri!shape,
  decorativeBarPosition: ri!decorativeBarPosition,
  decorativeBarColor: ri!decorativeBarColor
)

_a-0000e3c8-6861-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_triggerRefresh
_a-0000e3c8-6861-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

Use this rule in any saveInto to update the value of a local variable triggerRefresh.

It should be used in conjunction with a local variable configured to refresh
whenever this rule is executed. To configure the local variable you intend to refresh,
set it up like this:

a!localVariables(
  local!triggerRefresh: now(),

  local!data: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ..(value definition)..,
    refreshOnVarChange: local!triggerRefresh
  )
)

*/

a!save(
  ri!triggerRefresh,
  now()
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
The main rule to merge the ID-output of a WriteRecords SS node back to the input process variable.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord (see that description)
- In the output of a WriteRecords SS, do:
  A - New Custom Output
  B - rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: pv![the pv your wrote],
        recordsUpdated: ac!RecordsUpdated,
        fksToParent: {list of record fields that are FKs to the primary PK you wrote}
      )
  C - Save this back to the pv you wrote

MAPPING FKS:
- Using this rule in the current state, child-FKs can only be set 
where they map back to the primary record type, using input "fksToParent".
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case", 
    - you could set "Case.Comment.caseId"
    - you could set "Case.Comment.Replies.caseId"
    - but not "Case.Comment.Replies.commentId" (since the FK "commentId" is not the PK of "Case")
- To set other foreign keys, you would have to run manual update rules using the result of this.
Note:
- "fksToParent" is optimized for 1:M relationships.
  - Setting an fkToParent for a 1:1 will create an instance of that child record if it is null.

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The result of THIS rule will have data that IS considered changed, 
so a designer should be cautious about re-writing this later in process 
as it could cause race condition and performance side affects.

- Also, the result of this WILL NOT have custom-fields calculated, 
since they can be changed as a result of the write, but this rule is not re-querying.
If you need these, then re-query.

- This should generally only be used for downstream flows that don't write it directly again, 
such as document processing, emails, etc.
*/
if(
  or(
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)),
    runtimetypeof(ri!recordsUpdated) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
  ),
  if(
    count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated)) = 0,
    ri!processData,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!recordsUpdated))),
      expression: rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
        processData: a!flatten(ri!processData)[fv!index],
        recordsUpdated: cast(
          runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData)),
          ri!recordsUpdated
        )[fv!index],
        fksToParent: ri!fksToParent
      )
    )
  ),
  a!localVariables(
    local!keys: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!keys(ri!recordsUpdated),
      expression: a!map(
        key: fv!item,
        isPrimaryKey: runtimetypeof(fv!item) = 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}RecordField'
      )
    ),
    local!keysOrganized: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
      records: local!keys,
      field: "isPrimaryKey",
      value: true,
      filterType: "FULL_RESULT"
    ),
    local!primaryKeyField: local!keysOrganized.firstMatch.key,
    local!updates: rule!AS_GCM_setRecordFields(
      record: ri!processData,
      neverOverwrite: {
        a!map(
          field: local!primaryKeyField,
          value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField]
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
          items: ri!fksToParent,
          expression: a!map(
            field: fv!item,
            value: ri!recordsUpdated[local!primaryKeyField],
            /*Children get complicated, and an update should only run if a child is actually attached*/
            applyWhen: a!match(
              value: runtimetypeof(ri!processData[fv!item]),
              equals: runtimetypeof(a!flatten(ri!processData[fv!item])),
              then: count(ri!processData[fv!item]) > 0,
              equals: tointeger(
                'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Variant?list'
              ),
              then: or(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: ri!processData[fv!item],
                  expression: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(fv!item)
                )
              ),
              default: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!processData[fv!item])
            )
          )
        )
      },
      childRelationships: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!keysOrganized.rejects,
        expression: a!map(
          field: fv!item.key,
          value: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!processData[fv!item.key]),
            ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
            rule!AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable(
              processData: ri!processData[fv!item.key],
              recordsUpdated: ri!recordsUpdated[fv!item.key],
              fksToParent: {}
            )
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    local!updates
  )
)

_a-0000e8e5-7677-8000-9c1d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CRD_clauseFillinList
_a-0000e8e5-7677-8000-9c1d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fillInTypeMap: rule!AS_GCM_CONS_fillInTypeMaps(
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    returnTableFillinTypes: true
  ),
  local!selectedFillinRec,
  local!tablesFillInMaps: rule!AS_GCM_ConstructTableFillInMaps(
    clauseText: ri!clauseTextInRTE,
    clause: ri!clause
  ),
  local!nonTableFillInMaps: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: rule!AS_GCM_getFillinMapsAndClauseTextUsingHighlightOrCiteTags(
      isIgnoreTables: true,
      clauseText: ri!clauseTextInRTE,
      clauseNumber: ri!clause[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber],
      fillinMaps: ri!fillinMaps
    ).fillinMaps,
    expression: #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:update"(
      fv!item,
      "startIndex",
      find(fv!item.uuid, ri!clauseTextInRTE)
    )
  ),
  local!sortedFillInMaps: todatasubset(
    arrayToPage: {
      local!tablesFillInMaps,
      local!nonTableFillInMaps
    },
    pagingConfiguration: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
      1,
      - 1,
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "startIndex", ascending: true)
    )
  ).data,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: local!sortedFillInMaps,
    expression: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(fv!item.uuid),
      {},
      a!localVariables(
        local!isTableFillIn: or(
          fv!item.fillinType = cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CUSTOM_FILL_IN_TYPE_TABLE,
          fv!item.fillinType = cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CUSTOM_FILL_IN_TYPE_RICH_TEXT_TABLE
        ),
        local!showRemoveConfirmation: contains(ri!removeFillinsUuid, fv!item.uuid),
        local!showFillinRec: contains(local!selectedFillinRec, fv!item.uuid),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
          contents: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
              contents: {
                /*FILL-IN TEXT AND FILL-IN TYPE for each fillin*/
                rule!AS_GCM_SBS_clauseTextFillinTextAndIcons(
                  bundle: ri!bundle,
                  fillinMap: fv!item,
                  fillInTypeMap: local!fillInTypeMap,
                  triggerSave: ri!triggerSave,
                  clauseTextInRTE: ri!clauseTextInRTE,
                  runTimeClauseText: ri!runTimeClauseText,
                  showFillinRec: local!showFillinRec,
                  removeFillinsUuid: ri!removeFillinsUuid,
                  showRemoveConfirmation: local!showRemoveConfirmation,
                  fillInMapsList: ri!fillinMaps,
                  aiIdentifiedFillInsUuids: ri!aiIdentifiedFillInsUuids,
                  isCreate: ri!isCreate
                ),
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                  value: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                      text: "Table Preview",
                      style: "STRONG"
                    )
                  },
                  marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
                  showWhen: local!isTableFillIn
                ),
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
                  contents: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
                      contents: {
                        rule!AS_GCM_GRD_TableFillInPreview(
                          bundle: ri!bundle,
                          tableFillInMap: fv!item
                        )
                      },
                      marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS"
                    )
                  },
                  padding: "STANDARD",
                  marginBelow: "STANDARD",
                  showBorder: false,
                  showWhen: and(
                    local!isTableFillIn,
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(fv!item.tableHeaderRowCells)
                  )
                ),
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                  labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                  value: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                      text: {
                        substitute(
                          "Manage Fill-In Values ([%1])",
                          "([%1])",
                          ""
                        )
                      },
                      style: "STRONG"
                    )
                  },
                  marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
                  marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS",
                  showWhen: or(
                    fv!item.fillinType = cons!AS_GCM_TXT_FILL_IN_TYPE_CHECKBOX,
                    local!isTableFillIn
                  ),

                ),
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                  labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                  value: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                      text: "Fill-in recommendations are not available for selected type",
                      color: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_GRAY_3
                    )
                  },
                  showWhen: or(
                    fv!item.fillinType = cons!AS_GCM_TXT_FILL_IN_TYPE_CHECKBOX,
                    local!isTableFillIn
                  ),

                ),
                /*FILL-IN RECOMMENDATIONS/AUTO POPULATE VALUE GRID*/
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
                  label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                    bundle: ri!bundle,
                    bundleKey: "lbl_ManageFillinValues",
                    arguments: count(fv!item.fillinRecommendations)
                  ),
                  isCollapsible: true,
                  isInitiallyCollapsed: true,
                  labelSize: "EXTRA_SMALL",
                  labelColor: "STANDARD",
                  labelHeadingTag: "H4",
                  contents: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
                      contents: {
                        rule!AS_GCM_CPS_fillInRecommendation(
                          bundle: ri!bundle,
                          refFillinRecType: ri!refFillinRecType,
                          refClauseSetType: ri!refClauseSetType,
                          selectedFillinUuidsForRecommendations: local!selectedFillinRec,
                          fillinMap: fv!item,
                          fillInMapList: ri!fillinMaps,
                          isAddRecOrAutoPopulateReadOnlyMaps: ri!isAddRecOrAutoPopulateReadOnlyMaps
                        )
                      },
                      height: "AUTO",
                      shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
                      padding: "STANDARD",
                      marginAbove: "NONE",
                      marginBelow: "STANDARD",
                      showBorder: false
                    )
                  },
                  marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
                  marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS",
                  showWhen: and(
                    fv!item.fillinType <> cons!AS_GCM_TXT_FILL_IN_TYPE_CHECKBOX,
                    not(local!isTableFillIn)
                  )
                )
              },
              style: cons!AS_GCM_HEX_CODE_BLUE_0,
              shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
              padding: "STANDARD",
              showBorder: false
            ),
            rule!AS_GCM_CRD_confirmationCardForRemoval(
              confirmationText: "Are you sure you want to untag this fill-in?",
              confirmationTextStyle: "PLAIN",
              confirmLabel: "Untag",
              confirmStyle: "OUTLINE",
              confirmSaveInto: if(
                local!isTableFillIn,
                {
                  a!save(
                    ri!clauseTextInRTE,
                    substitute(
                      ri!clauseTextInRTE,
                      fv!item.tableText,
                      fv!item.tableTextWithoutFillIns
                    )
                  ),
                  a!save(
                    ri!runTimeClauseText,
                    substitute(
                      substitute(
                        ri!runTimeClauseText,
                        "<table >",
                        "<table>"
                      ),
                      fv!item.tableText,
                      fv!item.tableTextWithoutFillIns
                    )
                  ),
                  if(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!removeFillinsUuid),
                    ri!removeFillinsUuid,
                    a!save(
                      ri!removeFillinsUuid,
                      remove(
                        ri!removeFillinsUuid,
                        wherecontains(fv!item.uuid, ri!removeFillinsUuid)
                      )
                    )
                  ),
                  if(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!fillinMaps),
                    ri!fillinMaps,
                    a!save(
                      ri!fillinMaps,
                      remove(
                        ri!fillinMaps,
                        rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
                          records: ri!fillinMaps,
                          field: "uuid",
                          value: fv!item.uuidsInTable,
                          filterType: "MATCH_INDICES"
                        )
                      )
                    )
                  )
                },
                {
                  a!save(
                    ri!clauseTextInRTE,
                    substitute(
                      ri!clauseTextInRTE,
                      fv!item.highlightTag,
                      rule!AS_GCM_UT_removeHightlightTags(clauseText: fv!item.highlightTag)
                    )
                  ),
                  a!save(
                    ri!runTimeClauseText,
                    substitute(
                      ri!runTimeClauseText,
                      fv!item.highlightTag,
                      rule!AS_GCM_UT_removeHightlightTags(clauseText: fv!item.highlightTag)
                    )
                  ),
                  a!save(
                    ri!removeFillinsUuid,
                    remove(
                      ri!removeFillinsUuid,
                      wherecontains(fv!item.uuid, ri!removeFillinsUuid)
                    )
                  ),
                  a!save(
                    ri!fillinMaps,
                    remove(
                      ri!fillinMaps,
                      wherecontains(fv!item.uuid, ri!fillinMaps.uuid)
                    )
                  )
                }
              ),
              confirmationIcon: "exclamation-triangle",
              cancelLabel: "Cancel",
              cancelStyle: "LINK",
              cancelSaveInto: a!save(
                ri!removeFillinsUuid,
                remove(
                  ri!removeFillinsUuid,
                  wherecontains(fv!item.uuid, ri!removeFillinsUuid)
                )
              ),
              showBorder: false,
              padding: "STANDARD",
              stackWhen: {
                "PHONE",
                "TABLET_PORTRAIT",
                "TABLET_LANDSCAPE",
                "DESKTOP_NARROW"
              },
              alignVertical: "MIDDLE",
              cardMarginAbove: "LESS",
              cardMarginBelow: "LESS",
              showWhen: local!showRemoveConfirmation
            )
          },
          showWhen: true,
          shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",

_a-0000e615-fd0f-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!clauseDetails: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getRefClause(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
    executeWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseNumber),
    logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
      operator: "AND",
      filters: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!clauseNumber,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseNumber)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.alternateValue,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!alternateValue,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!alternateValue)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.alternateValue,
          operator: "is null",
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!alternateValue)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.deviation,
          operator: "=",
          value: ri!deviation,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!deviation)
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
          field: recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId,
          operator: "<>",
          value: ri!clauseId,
          applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!clauseId)
        )
      }
    ),
    fields: {
      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber,
      recordType!AS GCM R Clause.alternateValue
    }
  ),
  if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!clauseDetails),
    rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: ri!i18nData,
      bundleKey: a!match(
        value: {},
        whenTrue: and(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!alternateValue),
          rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!deviation)
        ),
        then: "vld_DuplicateDeviationWithAltValue",
        whenTrue: rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!deviation),
        then: "vld_DuplicateDeviationWithoutAltValue",
        whenTrue: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!alternateValue),
        then: "vld_DuplicateAlternateClause",
        default: "vld_ClauseNumber"
      )
    ),
    null
  )
)

a!localVariables(
  /*The button layout, which can dynamically be inside a section or not*/

    value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"(

        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          accessibilityText: ri!nextAccessibilityText,
          label: ri!nextLabel,
          size: ri!nextSize,
          saveInto: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!nextSaveInto),
            {},
            ri!nextSaveInto
          ),
          style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!nextStyle,
            replacementValue: "SOLID"
          ),
          validate: a!defaultValue(value: ri!nextValidate, default: true),
          validationGroup: ri!nextValidationGroup,
          disabled: ri!nextDisabled,
          confirmHeader: ri!nextHeader,
          confirmMessage: ri!nextMessage,
          showWhen: ri!nextShowWhen
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          accessibilityText: ri!confirmAccessibilityText,
          label: ri!confirmLabel,
          size: ri!confirmSize,
          saveInto: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!confirmSaveInto),
            {},
            ri!confirmSaveInto
          ),
          style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!confirmStyle,
            replacementValue: "SOLID"
          ),
          tooltip: ri!confirmTooltip,
          validate: a!defaultValue(value: ri!confirmValidate, default: true),
          validationGroup: ri!confirmValidationGroup,
          submit: ri!confirmSubmit,
          disabled: ri!confirmDisabled,
          confirmHeader: ri!confirmHeader,
          confirmMessage: ri!confirmMessage,
          showWhen: ri!confirmShowWhen
        )
      },
      secondaryButtons: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          accessibilityText: ri!backAccessibilityText,
          label: ri!backLabel,
          size: ri!backSize,
          saveInto: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!backSaveInto),
            {},
            ri!backSaveInto
          ),
          style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!backStyle,
            replacementValue: "LINK"
          ),
          validate: false,
          disabled: ri!backDisabled,
          confirmHeader: ri!backHeader,
          confirmMessage: ri!backMessage,
          showWhen: ri!backShowWhen
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          accessibilityText: ri!cancelAccessibilityText,
          label: ri!cancelLabel,
          size: ri!cancelSize,
          saveInto: if(
            rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!cancelSaveInto),
            {},
            ri!cancelSaveInto
          ),
          style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!cancelStyle,
            replacementValue: "LINK"
          ),
          validate: false,
          submit: ri!cancelSubmit,
          disabled: ri!cancelDisabled,
          confirmHeader: ri!cancelHeader,
          confirmMessage: ri!cancelMessage,
          showWhen: ri!cancelShowWhen
        )
      },
      showWhen: ri!showWhen
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  /*Components to show*/
  if(
    ri!includeDivider,
    {
      /*Above divider section*/
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
        contents: {},
        divider: "ABOVE",
        showWhen: ri!divider <> "BELOW",
        marginBelow: "LESS",
        marginAbove: "LESS"
      ),
      /*Button Layout*/
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
        columns: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(contents: local!buttonLayout),
        marginBelow: "NONE"
      ),
      /*Below divider section*/
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
        contents: {},
        divider: "BELOW",
        showWhen: ri!divider = "BELOW"
      )
    },
    /*Button Layout*/
    local!buttonLayout
  )
)

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*The main rule to "cleanse" the input of a WriteRecords SS node to remove non-writable relationships.

STANDARD USAGE:
- Use this in tandem with rule AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable (see that description)
- In the input of a WriteRecords SS (NOT in a previous script task), do:
  A - Expressionable input to "Records" intput
  B - rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord(
    records: pv![the pv to write],
    relationships: {list of record relationships that are not allowed to be written}
  )

IMPORTANT GENERAL NOTES: 
- The reason to run this in the input of the WriteRecords SS instead of a previous script task
is that, when used with AS_GCM_mergeWriteRecordIdsToProcessVariable, you can maintain the relationships
that you had to drop before writing.
  -> For example, if you are writing "Case" but it has a child-relationship "Address" that cannot be written,
    - this will drop "Address" before attempting to write
    - if the output is configured properly it will reattach "Address" in the output
    - the overall result is that you basically ran the node as if "Address" was ignored, 
      so that you can use it later in the process flow
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: a!flatten(ri!records),
  expression: reduce(
    rule!AS_GCM_dropNonWritableRelationshipsFromRecord_Reducer(record: _, relationship: _),
    fv!item,
    a!defaultValue(
      value: ri!nonWritableRelationships,
      default: difference(
        rule!AS_GCM_getAllPresentRelationshipsFromRecord(records: fv!item),
        ri!writableRelationships
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_GAM_COMP_richTextFieldWithTablePlugin
_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/* Context: on page load, any editable RichTextField will load, rendering Quill's logic to format the input into a "Quill-style" HTML. RichTextField will also render when there is any interaction with the form via other components, because it's default set to refreshAlways=true. We want to address the scenario where if the user makes an interaction with the form but does not modify the value of the RichTextField, the naive implementation of RichTextField will update the original input text value to be "Quill-styled". This causes issues in GCM when trying to compare the stored HTML (that wasn't actually updated in the RichTextField but because of another form interaction causing the "Quill-style" to be applied) to the HTML from acquisition.gov. The fix works as follow: 1) Upon loading the form, we will store the original input text value 2) Upon loading the form, we will also store the Quill-style HTML based on the original input text value 3) During each trigger of RichTextField's saveInto (either because of another component's interaction or the RichTextField's interaction), we will check to see if the current Quill-style HTML is the same as the original Quill-style HTML. 3a) If they are the same, this means that either there was an interaction with a non-RTE component or that the user reverted their changes to the original input text value. We will then output the original HTML value, instead of the Quill-style HTML 3b) If they are different, this means that the user changed the input value in the RTE, and therefore we need to store the Quill-style HTML Refer to the comments for local!originalText, local!quillFormattedOriginalText, and for the saveIntos for the RTE Implications/TO-DOs: 1) If the RTE is first rendered as read-only on form load, then Quill will not execute to render the Quill-style HTML. Even if there was a checkbox to turn the RTE editable, Quill had already loaded and so making it editable does not cause it to execute. This means that we cannot get the Quill-style HTML based on the original input text value at load. 2) If there is another component on the page that causes the input text to be updated (e.g., there is a dropdown that depending on the value of the dropdown causes the initial text to change), then we will always be storing Quill-style HTML of those input texts. However, perhaps this is what is expected. */ /* RichTextField doesn't support validations on the "required" field. Refer to https://community.appian.com/w/the-appian-playbook/1378/end-user-rich-text-editor-component. This implementation of RTE uses section-level validations if required=true in the RTE */ a!localVariables( local!required: if( ri!readOnly = true, false, rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!required) ), /*This stores the original text value on page load*/ local!originalText: a!refreshVariable( value: ri!text, refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false ), /*This stores the original text value on page load -- but in quill format*/ /*And the way this is actually set is through RTE's immediate save-out on page load of an editable RTE*/ /*To actually pass back out the "quill-style" HTML*/ local!quillFormattedOriginalText: null, if( cons!AS_GCM_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: ri!label, labelPosition: ri!labelPosition, readOnly: ri!readOnly, required: ri!required, requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage( label: ri!label, requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage ), validations: ri!validations, instructions: ri!instructions, characterLimit: a!defaultValue( ri!maxSize, cons!AS_GAM_INT_RTE_MAX_CHARACTERS ), value: substitute( joinarray(split(ri!text, "

"), char(10)), "

", "" ), saveInto: a!save( ri!text, "

" & joinarray(split(save!value, char(10)), "

") & "

" ) ), { richTextFieldWithTables( label: ri!label, labelPosition: ri!labelPosition, richTextValue: ri!text, richTextSaveInto: if( /*Added condition to handle saves on readonly */ri!readOnly = true(), {}, { if( /*This checks that the save-out is the initial RTE save out that happens on page load*/ and( rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!quillFormattedOriginalText), rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!originalText) ), /*On the very first load of the page, only save into quillFormattedOriginalText*/ /*This save out happens any time an editable rich text field is rendered*/ /*We can determine if its the first load by checking that quillFormattedOriginalText is null*/ a!save( local!quillFormattedOriginalText, save!value ), /*On subsequent interactions, first check if the quillFormattedOriginalText value is different than the original*/ /*And if so, only then perform the true saves we want*/ if( /*preventing ri!text save by updating ri!triggerSave as false*/ /*saving ri!triggerSave as true if ri!triggerSave=false as we need to update it to true anyways to trigger ri!text save*/ /*scenario: Enabling the button save when there is no change in clause RTE but a change in fill-in type dropdown*/ ri!triggerSave = false, a!save(ri!triggerSave, true), { a!save( ri!text, a!match( value: save!value, whenTrue: not( rule!AS_GCM_doesHtmlContainVisibleCharacters(text: fv!value) ), then: "", whenTrue: exact( tostring(fv!value), tostring(local!quillFormattedOriginalText) ), then: /*Run a "save" that sets ri!text back to its original value*/ local!originalText, default: /*Update ri!text*/ regexreplaceall( /* Removing the transparent background colors to make sure to pasted text is proper */ "background\-color:(" & char(32) & ")?(transparent|#ffffff|#FFFFFF);?", fv!value, "" ) ) ) } ) ), ri!saveInto } ), readOnly: ri!readOnly, required: ri!required, height: ri!height, validations: ri!validations, instructions: ri!instructions, maxSize: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull( nullableValue: ri!maxSize, replacementValue: cons!AS_GAM_INT_RTE_MAX_CHARACTERS ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"( showWhen: local!required, marginBelow: "NONE", validations: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_validationMessage"( message: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage( label: ri!label, requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage ), validateAfter: "SUBMIT", showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!text) ) ) } ) )

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  sort: ri!sort,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  recordType: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!fillInRecFillInUuid)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.fillInRecFillInUuid,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!fillInRecFillInUuid
    ),
    a!match(
      value: ri!isAutoPopulated,
      /* When nothing is passed all data should be returned     */
      whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!value),
      then: {},
      equals: true(),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.isAutoPopulated,
        operator: "=",
        value: true
      ),
      /*  When false is passed returning all data except isAutoPopulated=true    */
      default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.isAutoPopulated,
        operator: "<>",
        value: true
      ),
      
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(input: ri!includeInactive)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  fields: ri!fields
)

            )
          )

a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
  local!referenceData: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getRefData(
    refTypes: {
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_SOURCE,
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_TYPE,
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_FORMAT,
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSESET_DATA,
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_FILL_IN_REC_TYPE,
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CONTRACT_FORMAT
    },
    doCastToCdt: false()
  ),
  local!refFillinRecType: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
    cdtOrRecord: local!referenceData,
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refType,
    value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_FILL_IN_REC_TYPE
  ),
  local!refClauseSetType: rule!AS_GAM_rejectCdtOrRecordDataByField(
    cdtOrRecord: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
      cdtOrRecord: local!referenceData,
      field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refType,
      value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSESET_DATA
    ),
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refDataId,
    value: {
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_CONTRACT_TYPE_DATA,
      cons!AS_GCM_REF_ID_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTION_DATA
    }
  ),
  local!referenceSection: rule!AS_GCM_QR_getReferenceSectionData(executeWhen: true),
  local!typeChoice: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
    cdtOrRecord: local!referenceData,
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refType,
    value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_TYPE
  ),
  local!sourceChoice: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
    cdtOrRecord: local!referenceData,
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refType,
    value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CLAUSE_SOURCE
  ),
  local!formatChoice: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
    cdtOrRecord: local!referenceData,
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refType,
    value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_FORMAT
  ),
  local!contractFormats: rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
    cdtOrRecord: local!referenceData,
    field: recordType!AS GCM R Data.refType,
    value: cons!AS_GCM_REF_TYPE_CONTRACT_FORMAT
  ),
  local!isCreate: a!isNullOrEmpty(
    ri!refClause[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseId]
  ),
  local!milestoneSteps: {
    "",
    ""
  },
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    label: if(
      local!isCreate,
      "",
      concat(
        "",
        " | ",
        ri!refClause[recordType!AS GCM R Clause.clauseNumber]
      )
    ),
    contents: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: local!milestoneSteps,
        expression: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
            contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
              columns: {
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
                  contents: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
                      contents: {
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                          value: {
                            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: { fv!index }, style: { "STRONG" })
                          },
                          align: "CENTER"
                        )
                      },
                      height: "AUTO",
                      style: if(
                        ri!formStepNumber = fv!index,
                        "ACCENT",
                        "STANDARD"
                      ),
                      shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
                      marginBelow: "NONE",
                      showBorder: false,
                      accessibilityText: if(
                        ri!formStepNumber = fv!index,
                        "Current step",
                        "Previous step"
                      )
                    )
                  },
                  width: "EXTRA_NARROW"
                ),
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
                  contents: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                      value: {
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                          text: fv!item,
                          color: if(
                            ri!formStepNumber = fv!index,
                            "ACCENT",
                            "SECONDARY"
                          ),
                          size: "MEDIUM_PLUS"
                        )
                      }
                    )
                  },
                  width: "WIDE_PLUS"
                ),
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(width: "WIDE")
              },
              alignVertical: "MIDDLE",
              marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
              marginBelow: "LESS"
            ),
            divider: if(
              and(ri!formStepNumber <> fv!index, fv!index = 1),
              "BELOW",
              "NONE"
            )
          ),
          choose(
            ri!formStepNumber,
            rule!AS_GCM_SCT_clauseProperties(
              refClause: ri!refClause,
              typeChoice: local!typeChoice,
              sourceChoice: local!sourceChoice,
              clauseSectionChoice: local!referenceSection,
              formatChoices: local!formatChoice,
              bundle: local!bundle,
              isCreate: local!isCreate,
              showWhen: ri!formStepNumber = fv!index,
              userAction: ri!userAction,
              formStepNumber: ri!formStepNumber,
              contractFormats: local!contractFormats
            ),
            rule!AS_GCM_CPS_clauseTextAndTagFillIns(
              refClause: ri!refClause,
              bundle: local!bundle,
              showWhen: ri!formStepNumber = fv!index,
              formStepNumber: ri!formStepNumber,
              userAction: ri!userAction,
              isCreate: local!isCreate,
              refFillinRecType: local!refFillinRecType,
              refClauseSetType: local!refClauseSetType,
              fillinRecommendations: ri!fillinRecommendations,
              deletedFillinRecommendations: ri!deletedFillinRecommendations,
              refClauseText: ri!refClauseText,
              isIdentifyFillInWithAI: ri!isIdentifyFillInWithAI,
              clauseTextForAI: ri!clauseTextForAI,
              tempFillInMaps: ri!tempFillInMaps,
              aiIdentifiedFillInsUuids: ri!aiIdentifiedFillInsUuids
            )
          )
        }
      )
    }
  )
)
